price: Saa adom no firi Nyankopͻn hͻ, na Nyankopͻn som bo sε Ɔne (biribiara ho) Nimdefoͻ.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-faḍlu mina al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi ʿalīman
